cards.name: Dumpling
cards.description: Increases points the more Dumplings you have.

cards.name: 3 Maki
cards.description: Whoever has the most gets 6, whoever has the second most gets 3. Ties split points.

cards.name: 2 Maki
cards.description: Whoever has the most gets 6, whoever has the second most gets 3. Ties split points.

cards.name: 1 Maki
cards.description: Whoever has the most gets 6, whoever has the second most gets 3. Ties split points.

cards.name: Pudding
cards.description: Whoever has the most gets 6 points, whoever has the least loses 6 points. Ties split points.

cards.name: Wasabi
cards.description: Triples the points of your next Nigiri.

cards.name: Chopsticks
cards.description: Can trade Chopsticks from your plate for 2 cards.
